data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 18,439 believers in Dakshin Dinajpur, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dakshin Dinajpur, West Bengal, India

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 18,439 believers in Dakshin Dinajpur to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.section_summary: On average, 136 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Dakshin Dinajpur, West Bengal, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, encourage the 18,439 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 18,439 believers in Dakshin Dinajpur that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Brahmin Radhi people. Make the Brahmin Radhi people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Dakshin Dinajpur access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Dakshin Dinajpur are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.section_summary:
the county of Dakshin Dinajpur, West Bengal, India has a population of 1,676,300.

We estimate Dakshin Dinajpur has 18,439 people who might know Jesus, 20,339 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,637,522 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Dakshin Dinajpur, West Bengal, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
